channel.title: Recent event
channel.description:
I know i havent played the server very much lately, but i stopped by the forums and noticed this topic:
http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,548657.0.html
can anyone elaborate on the details of what happened and why it happened?

item.title: Recent event
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff
item.description:
@Tarkoff wrote:

I was on when he was banned.
It was a discussion and AGL was trolling trying to push Tomâ€™s buttons. Tom Banned him with good cause and now AGL is upset.
He did bring this on himself, he likes to push the edge of trolling and all the long time players have gotten used to it.
But you can see how new players can get upset as what regrettably happened to me and Meep.
Its sad cause he is one of the most loyal player we have but I agree he need to be punished a bit.

Read full topic
